text: Blossoms Senior Secondary School is a higher-secondary co-education private school in the Patiala city of Punjab. The school was founded in 1981 and is affiliated to the Central Board of Secondary Education of India. == References == == External links == * Category:Co-educational schools in India Category:High schools and secondary schools in Patiala Category:Educational institutions established in 1981 Category:1981 establishments in India
title: Blossoms Senior Secondary School
